title: HOFers and a few Hindus for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: HOFers and a few Hindus for sale
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I need to get some $ into my PP account, so I'm offering up some HOFers.  Many have not been on the market for a few years (some are in my ebay store, but just cheaper here).

Shipping is $2.50 for one card, and up from there (I'll just charge you what it costs to get the cards to you, nothing more).

Brown port EPDG $125
Keeler SGC 45 $160
Willis Hindu $215
Bresnahan Cycle 350 $160
Waddell SC 150/25 $150
Waddell P150 (pinhole) $80
Keeler port PSA 2 (incredible, basically perfect front) $175
McGraw SC 150/25 $150
Wallace Sov350 $78
Griffith PB SGC 40 $85
Steinfeldt Hindu $220
Shaw Hindu $200
